issue.title: pluto.tv
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://pluto.tv/es/on-demand/series/detective-conan-es/season/2/episode/el-caso-de-los-trillizos-asesinos-1996-2-74](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpluto.tv%2Fes%2Fon-demand%2Fseries%2Fdetective-conan-es%2Fseason%2F2%2Fepisode%2Fel-caso-de-los-trillizos-asesinos-1996-2-74) ### Comment > Cuando AdGuard está habilitado, la barra de progreso (en amarillo) de reproducción en la plataforma de PlutoTV desaparece y no se puede seleccionar. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/35b1kzp8asao480884w8o484c8w040487n3olu6ru4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s42wwje5uy8sc0s8gggwo8o4w04k8kc86tfa1vssmk.png?nc=1)

Block Flash,
Block Java,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (https://www.roche.com/) DNS filtering: | server: `https://***.d.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`

issue.title: thestreameast.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://thestreameast.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fthestreameast.to) ### Comment > Streameast is the largest sports streaming site and blocking pop up’s is no longer working. > > On iPhone AdGuard used to work with default filters and completely blocked popups. > > Lately it only worked at blocking popups with annoyance filters on. > > Now it doesn’t work no matter what filters are on. > > The attached screenshot is the website that pops up now on about half the clicks of the video player. > > Fully updated app and filter list on fully updated iPhone. > > I love using AdGuard so I hope they can make my sports watching experience ad free again. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/npeijke6x340so0wsskg0c0goc4o4so1q1bvgdi6ut.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | AdGuard iPhone app Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
